item.title: Report E-2024010346
item.description:
Report E-2024010346

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-22T15:12:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-16
  • City: NORTH HUNTINGDON
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal XPB experienced a UN1760 Zep Clog Attack release from a box containing (4) 1-gallon poly jugs. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 1 cup of product released to a 1’ x 1’ area of the box/pallet located on the dock due to a forklift puncture. The damaged jug and neutralizer were placed into a 55-gallon poly drum. The impacted cardboard and cleanup debris were placed into a separate 55-gallon poly drum. All good freight was re-secured for shipment on. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.
